```{r}
#change UNIX timestamp to actual date
#seconds since Jan 01 1970. (UTC)
library(tidyr)
tcdat %>% dplyr::mutate(begin_time=anytime(as.integer(begin_time))) %>% dplyr::mutate_if(is.character,as.numeric) -> tcdat
                                                                
tcdat %>% head
```
